name: Teetotum
description:
A-D lean forward-backwards,  SPACE - jump, Arrows move left-right

Credits:

Ural Kemal Kavraal (ural89) - Game design,  programming, SFX.

Nazlıcan Nisa Okay (narkisos) - 2D art, sprites, background visuals.

This is a 2D platformer, you play as a circus jester. You must get over challenges as soon as possible. This is a game jam title.
